alert.note: Alert for Dewey; Sully (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Aberdeen (Northern and Northeastern South Dakota)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 03 at 6:32PM MDT by NWS Aberdeen
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Sully and southeastern Dewey Counties through 800 PM CDT/700 PM MDT/... At 731 PM CDT/631 PM MDT/, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Bush`s Landing, or 21 miles west of Onida, moving northwest at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Bush`s Landing around 735 PM CDT. Little Bend Rec Area around 750 PM CDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
